bio.name: enrico opezzo
bio.bio: As a junior front-end developer with a background in graphic design and watchmaking, I bring a unique perspective to web development. With five years of experience repairing and servicing luxury watches, and prior experience creating websites and graphic content as a freelancer, I'm now excited to apply my skills to create engaging and sustainable web experiences. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I've utilized the React framework to build single-page applications. Currently, I'm further enhancing my skills and broadening my knowledge through the study of Typescript.
